contexts.context: We use a multi-<mark>stage</mark> workflow for the transcriptions in order to allow for...
...to allow for ease of collaboration during the transcription <mark>stage</mark>. All of the transcriptions are in the Google...
...element it documents the set of revision campaigns or <mark>stages</mark> identified during the evolution of the original text....
...also contain a more structured account of the various <mark>stages</mark> or revisions associated with the evolution of a text...
...who the speech is directed to. Additionally, the <mark>stage</mark> includes toWhom to indicate the directionality of the action...
